tasks.label: C++ Run Global I/O (No Terminal + Timeout)
args: Remove-Item "${fileDirname}\temp.exe" -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Out-File -FilePath "${workspaceFolder}\output.txt" -InputObject ""; g++ "${file}" -std=c++17 -Wall -Wextra -o "${fileDirname}\temp.exe" 2>> "${workspaceFolder}\output.txt"; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { exit }; $p = Start-Process "${fileDirname}\temp.exe" -RedirectStandardInput "${workspaceFolder}\input.txt" -RedirectStandardOutput "${workspaceFolder}\output.txt" -NoNewWindow -PassThru; Start-Sleep 2; if (!$p.HasExited) { $p.Kill(); Add-Content "${workspaceFolder}\output.txt" "Your code is stuck (possible infinite loop)." }
